participant_1.background:
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
i work at a factory.
I try to do my laundry every other day, but I sometimes have to skip a day or two because of my theater commitments.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a childrens librarian.

participant_2.background:
I'm getting ready for my first school concert.
I like to take pictures of my son playing football.
I spend time in nature to make myself feel younger.
i am a pharmacist.
I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
My day is going well so far! I'm getting ready for my first school concert. I'm a little nervous, but I'm excited to share my music with everyone.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope it goes well. What kind of music do you play?
I play the violin. I've been playing since I was a child, and it's one of my favorite things to do.
I love the violin! It's such a beautiful instrument.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to take pictures of my son playing football. He's a really good player, and I love to capture his moments on film.
That's a great hobby! I bet your son loves seeing the pictures of himself playing.
He does! He always asks me to show him the pictures after I take them.
That's so sweet.
What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my kids, read, and write comics.
Comics? That's interesting. What kind of comics do you write?
I write mostly humor comics, but I also write some action and adventure comics.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to see some of your comics sometime.
Sure! I can send you some links.
Great! I'll check them out.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day.
You too!
